casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher B. SMITH 119A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 16, 2019 Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, for Smith, Christopher B. Tiffany Y. Lucas, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 16th of May 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of May 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 10th day of July 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
